## YearTemporalRangesTariffScheduleOptions.yearExtend property

Extend year constraints into the furture.

If `true` then extend the most recent year constraints into unbounded maximums. This is like defining a rule as "from year X onwards". <b>Note</b> this assumes that the rules being compared are already sorted in their natural order (see [compareTo()](./nifty-tou.yeartemporalrangestariff.compareto.md)<!-- -->).

**Signature:**

```typescript
yearExtend?: boolean;
```
